title: Find Familiar
content:
Saving Throw: None Ritual Spell: Yes

Find Familiar: Spider Summon spider familiar. Its deadly bite can poison enemies. Find Familiar: Raven Summon a raven familiar. It can launch precise attacks. Find Familiar: Frog Summon a frog familiar. Its skin is covered with dizzying toxins. Find Familiar: Cat Summon a cat familiar. Its meow can distract your enemies.
